home.title: Home
home.description: The darkness within me echoes with a haunting refrain, a melody of pain that no light can ever contain.

chmod.title: Chmod Calculator
chmod.description: A dead simple calculator for Unix chmod permissions

permissions.title: Permissions
permissions.description: In Unix systems, file permissions are managed through three (3) distinct classes/abstractions, the user or owner, the group and public. Each one of these can have read, write and/or execute permissions and, to represent those permissions, we can use a numeric or symbolic representation.

usage.title: How to use
usage.description: Check the boxes to give the permissions to each class. Each row represents a permission and each column represents a class. After checking all the permissions you desire for each class, click on whichever representation you would like to copy it.

404.title: Hey! What are you doing here?
404.description: The web page you are looking for does not exist!
